title: Flakey Fragment
content:
David Brian Koski on FB thread:Two SYTES make a KITE, which Fuller says are two, KAT and KATE(2) RITEs make a KATE(2) BITEs make a KAT(2) LITEs make what we called a KIT

author: Kirby Urner
